Add/Replace/Delete.Description: The ADD/Delete/Replace modifiers are used in a definition to Add/Delete/Replace an attribute to the Definition.
Add/Replace/Delete.Name: Add/Replace/Delete

Bold.Description: This is used to make the font bold.
Bold.Name: Bold

Font.Description: It specifies the supported font name.
Font.Name: Font

Height.Description: It specifies the height of the letter.
Height.Name: Height

Italic.Description: This is used to make the font italic.
Italic.Name: Italic

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use
